anya-e0103n7:47_0: ‘‘Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddiseyyāti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.128; a. ni. 1.276).
anya-e0103n7:48_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi yebhuyyena satthari niccalasaddhā eva honti.
anya-e0103n7:48_1: Iti suppaṭipannehi purisavisesehi avirahitabbato, tesañca avirahanato na santi etassa rahā pariccajanakā, natthi vā etassa raho sādhūhi pariccajitabbatāti arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:50_0: Na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenārahaṁ mato’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:51_0: Rahoti ca gamanaṁ vuccati, bhagavato ca nānāgatīsu paribbhamanasaṅkhātaṁ saṁsāre gamanaṁ natthi kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena bodhimūleyeva sabbaso sasambhārassa kammavaṭṭassa viddhaṁsitattā. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n7:54_0: Te mayhaṁ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā’’ti. (a. ni. 4.36);
anya-e0103n7:55_0: Evaṁ natthi etassa rahogamanaṁ gatīsu paccājātītipi arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:56_0: Raho vā gamanaṁ yassa, saṁsāre natthi sabbaso;
anya-e0103n7:58_2: Pāsaṁsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito.
anya-e0103n7:58_3: Tathā hesa anuttarena sīlena anuttarena samādhinā anuttarāya paññāya anuttarāya vimuttiyā asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti evaṁ tasmiṁ tasmiṁ guṇe vibhajitvā vuccamāne paṇḍitapurisehi devehi brahmehi bhagavatā vā pana pariyosāpetuṁ asakkuṇeyyarūpo.
anya-e0103n7:59_0: Guṇehi sadiso natthi, yasmā loke sadevake;
anya-e0103n7:64_0: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṁsā arahaṁ jino’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:65_2: Sambuddhoti hi ettha saṁ-saddo ‘‘saya’’nti etassa atthassa bodhako daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:65_6: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā ‘‘dikkhito na dadātī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:65_7: Evañca katvā atthavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:65_8: ‘‘Sammā sāmaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddho’’ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati, ‘‘sabbadhammāna’’nti pana atthato labbhamānaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:66_0: Idāni tassā visayaṁ ‘‘sabbadhamme’’ti sāmaññato vuttaṁ vibhajitvā dassetuṁ ‘‘abhiññeyye dhamme’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:66_5: Pubbabhāge vipassanāpaññāya, adhigamakkhaṇe maggapaññāya, aparabhāge sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi aññāsīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:66_10: Bahuvacananiddeso pana sopādisesādikaṁ pariyāyasiddhaṁ bhedaṁ gahetvā kato, uddeso vā ayaṁ catusaccadhammānanti.
anya-e0103n7:66_12: Uddeso ca avinicchitatthaparicchedassa dhammassa vasena karīyati.
anya-e0103n7:66_13: Uddesena hi uddisiyamānānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthitāmattaṁ vuccati, na paricchedoti aparicchedena bahuvacanena vuttaṁ yathā ‘‘appaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā dhammā’’ti (dha. sa.
anya-e0103n7:66_15: Sacchikātabbeti vā phalavimuttīnampi gahaṇaṁ, na nibbānassevāti bahuvacananiddeso kato.
anya-e0103n7:66_16: Evañca bhāvetabbeti ettha jhānānampi gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:67_0: Gāthāyaṁ bhāvetabbañcāti ettha ca-saddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena sacchikātabbassa gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:67_1: Tasmā buddhosmīti yasmā cattāri saccāni mayā buddhāni, saccavinimuttañca kiñci ñeyyaṁ natthi, tasmā sabbampi ñeyyaṁ buddhosmi, abbhaññāsinti attho.
anya-e0103n7:68_1: Evaṁ saccavasena sāmaññato vuttamatthaṁ dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṁ dvārappavattadhammehi, khandhādīhi ca saccavaseneva vibhajitvā dassetuṁ ‘‘api cā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:68_2: Tattha mūlakāraṇabhāvenāti santesupi avijjādīsu aññesu kāraṇesu tesampi mūlabhūtakāraṇabhāvena.
anya-e0103n7:68_3: Taṇhā hi kammassa vicittabhāvahetuto, sahāyabhāvūpagamanato ca dukkhavicittatāya padhānakāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:68_10: Taṇhāyapi pariññeyyabhāvasabbhāvato, upādānakkhandhantogadhattā ca dukkhasaccasaṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:69_2: Nava bhavāti kāmabhavādayo tayo, saññībhavādayo tayo, ekavokārabhavādayo tayoti nava bhavā.
anya-e0103n7:69_3: Cattāri jhānānīti aggahitārammaṇavisesāni cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni, vipākajjhānānaṁ vā etaṁ gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:69_4: Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṁ upanissayabhūtā taṇhā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhāti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:69_5: Kiriyadhammānaṁ pana yattha te tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā.
anya-e0103n7:70_2: Yasmā sāmaññato, visesato ca ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme buddho, tasmā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:70_3: Kinti āha ‘‘sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā’’ti, sabbassapi ñeyyassa sabbākārato aviparītaṁ sayameva abhisambuddhattāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:70_4: Imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa adhigamo dassito.
anya-e0103n7:71_0: Nanu ca sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṁ anāvaraṇañāṇaṁ, aññathā ‘‘cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni buddhañāṇānī’’ti (paṭi. ma.
anya-e0103n7:71_2: Na virujjhati, visayapavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṁ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā.
anya-e0103n7:71_3: Ekameva hi taṁ ñāṇaṁ anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayatāya sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ, tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya ‘‘anāvaraṇañāṇa’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:71_4: Yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṁ ‘‘sabbaṁ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṁ anavasesaṁ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ, tattha āvaraṇaṁ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa’’ntiādi (paṭi. ma. 1.119).
anya-e0103n7:71_5: Tasmā natthi nesaṁ atthato bhedo, ekantena cetaṁ evamicchitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:71_6: Aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṁ sādhāraṇatā, asabbadhammārammaṇatā ca āpajjeyya.
anya-e0103n7:71_7: Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṁ atthi, anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṁ na pavattati, tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva na siyā.
anya-e0103n7:71_8: Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇato, idha pana sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:71_9: Tassa cādhigamena bhagavā ‘‘sabbaññū, sabbavidū, sammāsambuddho’’ti ca vuccati na sakiṁyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato.
anya-e0103n7:71_11: 1.162) ‘‘vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ ‘‘buddho’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:71_12: Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṁ samatthatā ahosīti.
anya-e0103n7:72_1: kiṁ panidaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattamānaṁ sakiṁyeva sabbasmiṁ visaye pavattati, udāhu kamenāti?
anya-e0103n7:72_3: yadi tāva sakiṁyeva sabbasmiṁ visaye pavattati, atītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhādibhedabhinnānaṁ saṅkhatadhammānaṁ, asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṁ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṁ pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā, tathā ca sati ‘‘sabbe dhammā anattā’’ti vipassantānaṁ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati.
anya-e0103n7:72_4: Yepi ‘‘sabbañeyyadhammānaṁ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṁ vikapparahitaṁ sabbakālaṁ buddhānaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattati, tena te ‘sabbavidū’ti vuccanti, evañca katvā ‘caraṁ samāhito nāgo, tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṁ suvuttaṁ hotī’’ti vadanti, tesampi vuttadosānātivatti, ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṁ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṁ siyā.
anya-e0103n7:72_5: Tasmā sakiṁyeva ñāṇaṁ pavattatīti na yujjati.
anya-e0103n7:73_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṁ visaye ñāṇaṁ pavattati?
anya-e0103n7:73_2: Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena, disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho sambhavati, apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa.
anya-e0103n7:73_3: Ye pana ‘‘atthassa avisaṁvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṁ paccakkhaṁ katvā ‘sesepi eva’nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā, tañca ñāṇaṁ na anumānikaṁ saṁsayābhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:73_4: Saṁsayānubaddhaṁ hi loke anumānañāṇa’’nti vadanti, tesampi taṁ na yuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:73_5: Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṁvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṁ paccakkhaṁ katvā ‘‘sesepi eva’’nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
anya-e0103n7:74_0: Atha tampi paccakkhaṁ, tassa sesabhāvo eva na siyāti?
anya-e0103n7:74_3: Vuttaṁ hetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘buddhavisayo, bhikkhave, acinteyyo na cintetabbo.
anya-e0103n7:74_4: Yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā’’ti (a. ni. 4.77).
anya-e0103n7:74_6: yaṁkiñci bhagavatā ñātuṁ icchitaṁ sakalaṁ, ekadeso vā, tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya paccakkhato ñāṇaṁ pavattati, niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:74_7: Ñātuṁ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā, ekanteneva sā icchitabbā ‘‘sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā cittuppādappaṭibaddhā’’ti vacanato.
anya-e0103n7:75_0: Nanu ca etasmiṁ pakkhe yadā sakalaṁ ñātuṁ icchitaṁ, tadā sakiṁyeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṁ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti?
anya-e0103n7:75_3: Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā.
anya-e0103n7:75_4: Tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṁ ekadhammārammaṇaṁ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:75_9: Evamekajjhaṁ, visuṁ, sakiṁ, kamena vā icchānurūpaṁ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0103n7:76_0: 133.Vijjāhīti ettha vindiyaṁ vindatīti vijjā, yāthāvato upalabbhatīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:76_1: Attano vā paṭipakkhassa vijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā, tamokkhandhādikassa padālanaṭṭhenāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:76_2: Tato eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā.
anya-e0103n7:76_3: Sampannattāti samannāgatattā, paripuṇṇattā vā, avikalattāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:76_4: Tissannaṁ, aṭṭhannaṁ ca vijjānaṁ tattha tattha sutte gahaṇaṁ vineyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:76_5: Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṁ bāhusaccaṁ vīriyaṁ sati paññā ca.
anya-e0103n7:76_6: Ye sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘idha bhikkhu saddho hotī’’tiādi (a. ni. 10.11).
anya-e0103n7:76_7: Cattāri jhānānīti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.
anya-e0103n7:77_0: Kasmā panettha sīlādayo pannaraseva ‘‘caraṇa’’nti vuttāti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘imeyeva hī’’tiādi .
anya-e0103n7:77_1: Tena tesaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṁsato sādhanabhāvamāha.
anya-e0103n7:78_1: Kiñcāpi labbhati, na pana tathā, yathā bhagavatoti dassetuṁ ‘‘tattha vijjāsampadā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:78_2: Caraṇadhammapariyāpannattā karuṇābrahmavihārassa, so cettha mahaggatabhāvappattā sādhāraṇabhāvoti āha ‘‘caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṁ pūretvā ṭhitā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:78_3: Yathā sattānaṁ anatthaṁ parivajjetvā atthe niyojanaṁ paññāya vinā na hoti, evaṁ nesaṁ atthānatthajānanaṁ satthu karuṇāya vinā na hotīti ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā.
anya-e0103n7:78_4: Yattha pana yassā padhānabhāvo, taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘so sabbaññutāyā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:78_5: Tattha yathā taṁ vijjācaraṇasampannoti yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno, tena vijjācaraṇasampannassevāyaṁ āveṇikā paṭipattīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:78_6: Sā panāyaṁ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantakāraṇanti dassetuṁ ‘‘tenassā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:79_0: Ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti, caraṇasampadāya karuṇāmahattaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:79_1: Tesu paññāya bhagavato dhammarajjappatti, karuṇāya dhammasaṁvibhāgo.
anya-e0103n7:79_5: Paññāya sayaṁ taraṇaṁ, karuṇāya paresaṁ tāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:79_7: Karuṇāya vā bodhisattabhūmiyaṁ saṁsārābhimukhabhāvo, paññāya tattha anabhirati.
anya-e0103n7:79_8: Tathā karuṇāya paresaṁ abhiṁsāpanaṁ , paññāya sayaṁ parehi abhāyanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:79_9: Karuṇāya paraṁ rakkhanto attānaṁ rakkhati, paññāya attānaṁ rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhati.
anya-e0103n7:79_11: Tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti.
anya-e0103n7:79_14: Tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto, paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto.
anya-e0103n7:79_15: Yathā hi karuṇā bhagavato sinehasokavirahitā, evaṁ paññā ahaṁkāramamaṁkāravinimuttāti aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā vijjācaraṇasampadāhi pakāsitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:80_3: Gamanañca nāma bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṁ gamanaṁ dassento ‘‘ariyamaggo’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:80_4: So hi nibbānassa gati adhigamoti katvā ‘‘gataṁ, gamana’’nti ca vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:80_5: Idāni tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tena hesā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:80_7: Asajjamānoti paripanthābhāvena sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṁ akaronto, pageva itarattha.
anya-e0103n7:80_8: Atha vā ekāsane nisīditvā khippabhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṁ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno asajjanto gato.
anya-e0103n7:80_9: Yaṁ gamanaṁ gacchanto sabbamanatthaṁ apaharati, sabbañca anuttaraṁ sampattiṁ āvahati, tadeva sobhanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0103n7:80_10: Tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha ‘‘iti sobhanagamanattā sugato’’ti sobhanattho su-saddoti katvā.
anya-e0103n7:81_0: Asundarānaṁ dukkhānaṁ saṅkhārappavattīnaṁ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṁ nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti āha ‘‘sundarañcesa ṭhānaṁ gato amataṁ nibbāna’’nti.
anya-e0103n7:81_1: Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘nibbānaṁ paramaṁ sukha’’nti (ma. ni. 2.215; dha. pa. 203-204).
anya-e0103n7:81_3: Suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa gamananti āha ‘‘pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:81_4: Idañca sikhāppattaṁ sammāgamanaṁ, yāya āgamanīyapaṭipadāya siddhaṁ, sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā sugatoti dassetuṁ ‘‘sammā vā gato’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:81_6: ‘‘Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto’’ti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā avibhāgena sabbasattānaṁ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:81_7: ‘‘Sassataṁ ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gato’’ti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:81_8: ‘‘Kāmasukhaṁ attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gato’’ti etena ariyamaggagatiṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:82_0: Tatrāti yuttaṭṭhāne yuttasseva bhāsane nipphādetabbe, sādhetabbe cetaṁ bhummaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:82_2: Atthamukhena hi vācāya abhūtatā, bhūtatā vā.
anya-e0103n7:82_6: Anatthasañhitanti diṭṭhadhammikena, samparāyikena vā anatthena sañhitaṁ, anatthāvahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:82_7: Na atthoti anattho, atthassa paṭipakkho, abhāvo ca, tena sañhitaṁ, pisuṇavācaṁ, samphappalāpañcāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:82_9: Ettha ca paṭhamā vācā sīlavantaṁ ‘‘dussīlo’’ti, acaṇḍālādimeva ‘‘caṇḍālo’’tiādinā bhāsamānassa daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0103n7:82_11: Tatiyā nerayikādikassa nerayikādibhāvavibhāvanīkathā yathā ‘‘āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko’’tiādikā (cūḷava. 348).
anya-e0103n7:82_12: Catutthī ‘‘vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṁ sugatiṁ āvahatī’’ti lokassa byāmohanakathā.
anya-e0103n7:82_15: Evaṁ sammā gadattāti yathāvuttaṁ abhūtādiṁ vajjetvā bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasañhitaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato da-kārassa ta-kāraṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:82_16: Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṁ piyaṁ manāpameva atthasiddhiyā lokassa hitasukhāvahattā.
anya-e0103n7:83_0: Apica sobhanaṁ gataṁ gamanaṁ etassāti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṁ ekantena tesaṁ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṁ bhaddakaṁ .
anya-e0103n7:83_2: Tathā lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya dutavilambitakhalitānukaḍḍhananippīḷanukkuṭikakuṭilākulatādidosarahitavilāsitarājahaṁsavasabhavāraṇamigarājagamanaṁ kāyagamanaṁ, ñāṇagamanañca vipulanimmalakaruṇāsativīriyādiguṇavisesasahitaṁ abhinīhārato yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya, sattānaṁ hitasukhāvahatāya ca sobhanameva.
anya-e0103n7:83_3: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṁ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_4: Tathā lokasamudayaṁ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṁ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_5: Lokanirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_6: Lokanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_7: Tathā yaṁ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā, sabbaṁ taṁ hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya sammā paccakkhato gato abbhaññāsīti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:84_1: Yo yo loko yathā yathā veditabbo, tathā tathā.
anya-e0103n7:84_6: Samudayatoti yato so samudeti, tato taṇhādito.
anya-e0103n7:84_7: Nirodhatoti yattha so nirujjhati, tato visaṅkhārato.
anya-e0103n7:84_8: Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo, tato ariyamaggato, ito aññassa pakārassa abhāvā.
anya-e0103n7:85_0: Iti ‘‘sabbathā lokaṁ avedī’’ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṁ suttaṁ dassento ‘‘yattha kho āvuso’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:85_1: Tattha ‘‘na jāyatī’’tiādinā ujukaṁ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘na cavati na upapajjatī’’ti padadvayena aparāparaṁ cavanupapajjanāni paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0103n7:85_2: Keci pana ‘‘na jāyatītiādi gabbhaseyyakavasena vuttaṁ, itaraṁ opapātikavasenā’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n7:85_6: ‘‘Ñātāya’’nti vā pāṭho, ñātā ayaṁ nibbānatthikoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:86_0: Kāmaṁ pādagamanena gantvā lokassantaṁ ñātuṁ, daṭṭhuṁ, pattuṁ vā na sakkā, apica parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne taṁ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento ‘‘apicā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:86_3: Aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṁ na sakkāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:86_5: Lokanirodhanti tassa lokassa nirujjhanaṁ, nibbānameva vā.
anya-e0103n7:86_6: Adesampi hi taṁ yesaṁ nirodho, tesaṁ vasena upacārato, desatopi niddisīyati yathā ‘‘cakkhuṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.401; ma. ni. 1.134; vibha. 204).
anya-e0103n7:87_5: Tasmāti yasmā lokassantaṁ apatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā.
anya-e0103n7:87_9: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṁ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū.
anya-e0103n7:87_11: Sabbesaṁ kilesānaṁ samitattā, catusaccadhammānaṁ vā abhisamitattā samitāvī.
anya-e0103n7:87_13: Yathā imaṁ lokaṁ, evaṁ parañca lokaṁ appaṭisandhikattā.
anya-e0103n7:88_1: Evaṁ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvato dassitattā, loko pana ekadeseneva vuttoti taṁ anavasesato dassetuṁ ‘‘apica tayo lokā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:88_2: Tattha indriyabaddhānaṁ khandhānaṁ samūho, santāno ca sattaloko.
anya-e0103n7:88_3: Rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya satto, lokīyanti ettha kusalākusalaṁ, tabbipāko cāti lokoti.
anya-e0103n7:88_4: Anindriyabaddhānaṁ rūpādīnaṁ samūho, santāno ca okāsaloko lokiyanti ettha tasā, thāvarā ca, tesañca okāsabhūtoti.
anya-e0103n7:88_6: Ubhayepi khandhā saṅkhāraloko paccayehi saṅkharīyanti, lujjanti palujjanti cāti.
anya-e0103n7:88_8: Paccayattho hettha āhāra-saddo ‘‘ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni.
anya-e0103n7:88_10: Evaṁ hi ‘‘sabbe sattā’’ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti.
anya-e0103n7:88_11: Sā panāyaṁ āhāraṭṭhitikatā nippariyāyato saṅkhāradhammo, na sattadhammoti āha ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:89_2: Yathā aññatthāpi ‘‘ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
anya-e0103n7:89_5: Diṭṭhigatikānaṁ sassatādivasena ‘‘attā, loko’’ti ca parikappanā yebhuyyena sattavisayā, na saṅkhāravisayāti āha ‘‘sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:90_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti.
anya-e0103n7:90_1: Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṁ paribbhamaneneva tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti.
anya-e0103n7:90_2: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakaṁ sahassappakāro okāsaloko, sahassalokadhātuyoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:91_2: Eko lokoti ‘‘sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā, tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:91_3: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n7:91_4: Nāma-ggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṁ, tassa alokasabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n7:91_5: Nanu ca ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
anya-e0103n7:91_7: Atha vā ‘‘na lujjati na palujjatī’’ti yo gahito tathā na hoti, so lokoti taṁgahaṇarahitānaṁ lokuttarānaṁ natthi lokatā.
anya-e0103n7:92_3: 3.15) vacanato dukkhānattatā ca pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni.
anya-e0103n7:92_4: Nāmanti cattāro arūpino khandhā, te ca atthato phassādayo.
anya-e0103n7:92_5: Rūpanti bhūtupādāyarūpāni, tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā.
anya-e0103n7:92_6: Taggahaṇeneva ye tesaṁ visesā kusalādayo, hetuādayo ca, tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha ‘‘iti ayaṁ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:93_0: Āgamma cittaṁ seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya.
anya-e0103n7:93_1: Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo, evaṁ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṁ āgamma yattha seti, so tassa āsayoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:96_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṁ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā.
anya-e0103n7:96_1: Yathāha ‘‘dvayanissito khvāyaṁ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena atthitañca natthitañcā’’ti (saṁ. ni. 2.15).
anya-e0103n7:96_2: Atthitāti hi sassataggāho adhippeto, natthitāti ucchedaggāho.
anya-e0103n7:96_4: Vivaṭṭanissitānaṁ pana suddhasattānaṁ anulomikā khanti, yathābhūtañāṇanti duvidho āsayo.
anya-e0103n7:97_0: Āsayaṁ jānātīti catubbidhampi sattānaṁ āsayaṁ jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:97_1: Jānanto ca tesaṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ, tesañca ñāṇānaṁ appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:98_0: ‘‘Kāmaṁ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṁ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti, kāmaṁ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṁ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti’’ādi (paṭi. ma. 1.113).
anya-e0103n7:99_0: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayantīti anusayā, anurūpaṁ kāraṇaṁ labhitvā uppajjantīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:99_2: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n7:99_4: Rāgādayo satta anāgatā kilesā, atītā, paccuppannā ca taṁsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti.
anya-e0103n7:99_5: Na hi dhammānaṁ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi.
anya-e0103n7:99_6: Taṁ sattavidhaṁ anusayaṁ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṁ jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:100_4: Tā pana rāgadosamohasaddhābuddhivitakkavasena cha mūlacariyā, tāsaṁ apariyanto antarabhedo, saṁsaggabhedo pana tesaṭṭhividho.
anya-e0103n7:100_5: Taṁ caritaṁ sabhāvato saṁkilesavodānato samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:101_2: Yāya hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikeyeva sevanti, paṇītādhimuttikā ca paṇītādhimuttikeyeva.
anya-e0103n7:101_4: Taṁ adhimuttiṁ jānāti ‘‘imassa adhimutti hīnā, imassa paṇītā’’ti, tatthāpi ‘‘imassa mudu, imassa mudutarā, imassa mudutamā’’tiādinā.
anya-e0103n7:101_5: Indriyānaṁ hi tikkhamudubhāvādinā yathārahaṁ adhimuttiyā tikkhamudubhāvādiko veditabbo.
anya-e0103n7:101_7: 818, 820) ‘‘heṭṭhā gahitāpi adhimutti idha sattānaṁ tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanatthaṁ puna gahitā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:102_0: Apparajaṁ akkhaṁ etesanti apparajakkhā, appaṁ vā rajaṁ paññāmaye akkhimhi etesanti apparajakkhā, anussadarāgādirajā sattā, te apparajakkhe.
anya-e0103n7:103_4: Suviññāpayeti sammattaniyāmaṁ viññāpetuṁ sukare saddhe, paññavante ca.
anya-e0103n7:103_7: Ettha ca ‘‘imassa rāgarajo appo, imassa dosarajo appo’’tiādinā apparajakkhesu jānanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:103_9: Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti, tasmā assa bhagavato sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
anya-e0103n7:104_0: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi.
anya-e0103n7:104_1: Tassa pana jānanaṁ na nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṁ, bhagavato pana tampi suviditaṁ suvavatthāpitameva, payojanābhāvā desanaṁ nāruḷhaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:105_0: ‘‘Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ –
anya-e0103n7:105_1: yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito, ayaṁ vā mahāpathavī’’’tiādi (saṁ. ni. 5.1121).
anya-e0103n7:106_3: Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā ‘‘cakkavāḷa’’nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:106_4: Catutiṁsasatāni cāti catuadhikāni tiṁsasatāni, tīṇisahassāni, cattārisatāni cāti attho .
anya-e0103n7:106_8: Saṇṭhitīti heṭṭhā, uparito cāti sabbaso ṭhiti.
anya-e0103n7:107_2: Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva caturāsīti yojanasahassāniyeva ubbedho .
anya-e0103n7:107_3: Na kevalaṁ cettha ubbedhova, atha kho āyāmavitthārāpissa tattakāyeva.
anya-e0103n7:108_0: ‘‘Sineru, bhikkhave, pabbatarājā caturāsīti yojanasahassāni āyāmena, caturāsīti yojanasahassāni vitthārenā’’ti (a. ni. 7.66).
anya-e0103n7:109_0: Tatoti sinerussa heṭṭhā, upari ca vuttappamāṇato.
anya-e0103n7:109_3: dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato yugandharapabbato, ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:109_4: Yathā mahāsamuddo yāva cakkavāḷapādamūlā anupubbaninno, evaṁ yāva sinerupādamūlāti heṭṭhā sinerupamāṇato upaḍḍhapamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṁ suppatiṭṭhito, evaṁ īsadharādayopīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:109_5: Vuttaṁ hetaṁ ‘‘mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro’’ti (udā. 45; cūḷava. 384; a. ni. 8.19).
anya-e0103n7:109_7: Te vitthārato yathākkamaṁ sineruādīnaṁ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti.
anya-e0103n7:110_0: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā.
anya-e0103n7:110_1: Sineruṁ tāva parikkhipitvā ṭhito yugandharo, taṁ parikkhipitvā īsadharo.
anya-e0103n7:110_2: Evaṁ taṁ taṁ parikkhipitvā ṭhitā ‘‘sinerussa samantato’’ti vuttā.
anya-e0103n7:111_0: Yojanānaṁ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanānaṁ satāni ucco ubbedho.
anya-e0103n7:111_2: Paññāsayojanakkhandhasākhāyāmāti’ ubbedhato paññāsayojanakkhandhāyāmā, ubbedhato, samantato ca paññāsayojanasākhāyāmā ca.
anya-e0103n7:111_3: Tato eva satayojanavitthiṇṇā, tāvadeva ca uggatā.
anya-e0103n7:113_1: Sattamanti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṁ, sirīso bhavati sattamoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:114_1: Tassa āsannabhāvena candamaṇḍalaṁ attano chāyāya vikalabhāvena upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n7:114_9: Taṁtaṁnivāsīnaṁ, taṁtaṁparivāradīpavāsīnañca manussānaṁ mukhampi taṁtaṁsaṇṭhānanti vadanti.
anya-e0103n7:114_11: Tiṇṇaṁ hi pattānaṁ aññamaññaāsannabhāvena ṭhapitānaṁ antarasadise tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ cakkavāḷānaṁ antare ekeko lokantaranirayo.
anya-e0103n7:115_1: Bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi ‘‘ananto ākāso, ananto sattanikāyo, anantāni cakkavāḷānī’’ti tividhampi anantaṁ buddhañāṇaṁ paricchindati sayampi anantattā.
anya-e0103n7:115_6: Anantatā cassa anantañeyyapaṭivijjhaneneva veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā.
anya-e0103n7:115_8: Saccaṁ vattabbaṁ, sā pana parato abhiññākathāyaṁ āgamissatīti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n7:116_2: Tara-ggahaṇaṁ cettha ‘‘anuttaro’’ti padassa atthaniddesatāya kataṁ, na visiṭṭhassa kassaci atthitāya.
anya-e0103n7:116_3: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi, kuto sadiso.
anya-e0103n7:116_6: Abhibhavatīti sīlasampadāya upanissayabhūtānaṁ hirottappamettākaruṇānaṁ, visesapaccayānaṁ saddhāsativīriyapaññānañca ukkaṁsappattiyā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anaññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa pahīnattā ukkaṁsapāramippatto satthu sīlaguṇo.
anya-e0103n7:116_7: Tena bhagavā sadevakaṁ lokaṁ aññadatthu abhibhuyya pavattati, na sayaṁ kenaci abhibhuyyatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:117_0: Yadi evaṁ, kathaṁ tena sadevakaṁ lokaṁ abhibhavatīti?
anya-e0103n7:117_2: Tampi hi visayato, pavattito, pavatti ākārato ca uttaritarameva.
anya-e0103n7:117_3: Taṁ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṁ satthu vimuttiguṇaṁ ārabbha pavattati, pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṁ paramagambhīraṁ saṇhasukhumaṁ savisayaṁ paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṁ vibhūtataraṁ katvā pavattati, sammadeva ca vasībhāvassa pāpitattā, bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā lahuṁ lahuṁ pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n7:118_0: Evaṁ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘asamo’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:118_1: Tattha asamoti ekasmiṁ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena samā sadisāti asamo.
anya-e0103n7:118_2: Tathā asamehi atītānāgatabuddhehi samo, asamā vā samā etassāti asamasamo.
anya-e0103n7:118_5: Tattha upamāmattaṁ paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo, yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭipuggalo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n7:119_0: Na kho panāhaṁ samanupassāmīti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya sabbalokaṁ passantopi tattha sadevake…pe…
anya-e0103n7:119_1: pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṁ sampannatarasīlaṁ kañci puggalaṁ na kho pana passāmi, tādisassa abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:120_0: ‘‘Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0103n7:120_1: Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā.
anya-e0103n7:120_2: Agge kho pana pasannānaṁ aggo vipāko hotī’’ti (a. ni. 4.34; 5.32; 10.15;
anya-e0103n7:122_1: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī’’ti (a. ni. 4.24; dī. ni. 3.188) –
anya-e0103n7:123_0: Evamādīni suttapadāni veditabbāni. Ādikā gāthāyoti ettha –
anya-e0103n7:124_0: ‘‘Ahaṁ hi arahā loke, ahaṁ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0103n7:125_0: Ekomhi sammāsambuddho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto. (mahāva. 11; ma. ni. 1.285; 2.341);
anya-e0103n7:127_0: Mutto mocayataṁ aggo, tiṇṇo tārayataṁ varo. (itivu. 112);
anya-e0103n7:133_1: Taṁ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṁ yathārahaṁ tadaṅgavinayādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṁ hotīti āha ‘‘vinetīti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:133_4: Taṁsadisatā ettha jotīyati, tena manussattamattaṁ natthi, aññaṁ samānanti yakkhādayo ‘‘amanussā’’ti adhippetā, na ye keci manussehi aññe.
anya-e0103n7:133_5: Tathā hi tiracchānapurisānaṁ visuṁ gahaṇaṁ kataṁ, yakkhādayo eva ca niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0103n7:133_14: Vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehīti etasmiṁ atthe vitthāretabbaṁ yathārahaṁ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayassa dīpanato.
anya-e0103n7:134_0: Visuddhasīlādīnaṁ paṭhamajjhānādīnīti ‘‘visuddhasīlassa paṭhamajjhānaṁ, paṭhamajjhānalābhino dutiyajjhāna’’ntiādinā tassa tassa uparūpari visesaṁ ācikkhantoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n7:134_2: ‘‘Dantepi dametiyevā’’ti idaṁ pubbe ‘‘sabbena sabbaṁ damathaṁ anupagatā purisadammā’’ti vuttāti katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:134_3: Ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṁ nātivattā, te satte sandhāya ‘‘dantepi dametiyevā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:134_4: Tepi hi purisadammā evāti, yato ne satthā dameti.
anya-e0103n7:135_2: Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo dassito hoti.
anya-e0103n7:135_5: Tā hi aññamaññasambandhāpi asaṁkiṇṇabhāvena dissanti apadissantīti disā, disā viyāti vā disā.
anya-e0103n7:135_8: Ekaṁyeva disaṁ dhāvati, attano kāyaṁ aparivattentoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:135_9: Satthārā pana damitā purisadammā ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti.
anya-e0103n7:135_11: Aṭṭha disāti ca nidassanamattametaṁ, lokiyehi agatapubbaṁ nirodhasamāpattidisaṁ, amatadisañca pakkhandanato.
anya-e0103n7:136_1: Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha niyuttoti diṭṭhadhammiko, idhalokattho .
anya-e0103n7:136_2: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko, tattha niyuttoti samparāyiko, paralokattho.
anya-e0103n7:136_6: Tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṁ yaṁ arahati, tadanurūpaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:136_7: Anusāsatīti vineti tasmiṁ atthe patiṭṭhapeti, saha atthena vattatīti sattho, bhaṇḍamūlena vāṇijjāya desantaraṁ gacchanto janasamūho.
anya-e0103n7:136_8: Hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo so etassa atthīti satthā, satthavāho.
anya-e0103n7:136_9: So viya bhagavāti āha ‘‘satthā viyāti satthā, bhagavā satthavāho’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:137_0: Idāni tamatthaṁ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṁ ‘‘yathā satthavāho’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:137_2: Kaṁ tārenti etthāti kantāro, nirudako araññappadeso.
anya-e0103n7:137_3: Ruḷhīvasena pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:137_9: Atha vā uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṁ upanento tāreti.
anya-e0103n7:137_11: Patāretīti pariggahetvā tāreti, hatthena pariggahetvā viya tāretīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:137_14: Mahāgahanatāya, mahānatthatāya, dunnittharaṇatāya ca jātiyeva kantāro jātikantāro, taṁ jātikantāraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:138_1: Devamanussā eva hi ukkaṭṭhasattā, na tiracchānādayo.
anya-e0103n7:138_4: Bhagavatoti nissakkavacanaṁ yathā ‘‘upajjhāyato ajjhetī’’ti, bhagavato santiketi vā attho.
anya-e0103n7:139_0: Gaggarāyāti gaggarāya nāma rañño deviyā, tāya vā kāritattā ‘‘gaggarā’’ti laddhanāmāya.
anya-e0103n7:139_1: Sare nimittaṁ aggahesīti ‘‘dhammo eso vuccatī’’ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṁ gaṇhi, gaṇhanto ca pasannacitto parisapariyante nipajji.
anya-e0103n7:139_2: Sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsīti tassa sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṁ apassanto tattha daṇḍaṁ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n7:139_3: Maṇḍūkopi daṇḍe ṭhapitepi uppīḷitepi dhammagatena pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi.
anya-e0103n7:139_4: Devaloke nibbattasattānaṁ ayaṁ dhammatā, yā ‘‘kutohaṁ idha nibbatto, tattha kiṁ nu kho kammamakāsi’’nti āvajjanā.
anya-e0103n7:139_5: Tasmā attano purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha ‘‘are ahampi nāma idhanibbatto’’ti .
anya-e0103n7:140_0: Bhagavā jānantova mahājanassa kammaphalaṁ, buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṁ kātukāmo ‘‘ko me vandatī’’ti gāthāya pucchi.
anya-e0103n7:140_1: Tattha koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko, katamoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:140_9: Sabbā obhāsayaṁ disāti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento, cando viya, sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṁ ekālokaṁ karontoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:141_0: Evaṁ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṁ pavedento ‘‘maṇḍūkohaṁ pure āsi’’nti gāthamāha.
anya-e0103n7:141_3: ‘‘Udake maṇḍūko’’ti etena uddhamāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṁ kataṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:141_4: Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṁ ghāsesanaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:141_5: Idha pana gocaro viyāti gocaro, vāri udakaṁ gocaro etassāti vārigocaro.
anya-e0103n7:141_6: Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti ‘‘vārigocaro’’ti visesetvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:141_7: Tava dhammaṁ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa tava dhammaṁ ‘‘dhammo eso vuccatī’’ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa.
anya-e0103n7:141_9: Avadhi vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama samīpaṁ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṁ sannirumbhitvā maṁ māresīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:142_0: Sitaṁ katvāti ‘‘tathā parittatarenāpi puññānubhāvena evaṁ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarā sampattiyo labbhantī’’ti pītisomanassajāto bhāsurataradhavalavipphurantadassanakiraṇāvalīhi bhiyyoso mattāya taṁ padesaṁ obhāsento sitaṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:144_0: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṁ passa jutiñca me.
anya-e0103n7:145_0: ‘‘Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṁ, dhammaṁ assosuṁ gotama;
anya-e0103n7:146_0: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṁ, yattha gantvā na socare’’ti. (vi. va. 859-860);
anya-e0103n7:148_3: Tasmā yaṁ kiñcīti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṁ kataṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:148_5: Tena ‘‘sammāsambuddho’’ti iminā saṅkhepato, vitthārato ca satthu catusaccābhisambodho vutto.
anya-e0103n7:148_7: Purimena vā satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo, pacchimena desanāñāṇānubhāvo.
anya-e0103n7:148_10: Tassa anto aggaphalaṁ, tattha bhavaṁ tasmiṁ laddhe laddhabbato vimokkhantikañāṇaṁ, sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṁ sabbampi buddhañāṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:149_0: ‘‘Sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, visavitāya buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddho, abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddho.
anya-e0103n7:149_1: Buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ, na pitarā kataṁ, na bhātarā kataṁ, na bhaginiyā kataṁ, na mittāmaccehikataṁ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṁ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṁ, na devatāhi kataṁ.
anya-e0103n7:149_2: Vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho’’ti (mahāni. 192) –
anya-e0103n7:150_1: Yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi, tasmā dvīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṁ ‘‘paṭisambhidānayo vā’’ti aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto.
anya-e0103n7:151_0: Tattha yathā loke avagantā ‘‘avagato’’ti vuccati, evaṁ bujjhitā saccānīti buddho suddhakattuvasena.
anya-e0103n7:151_1: Yathā paṇṇasosā vātā ‘‘paṇṇasusā’’ti vuccanti, evaṁ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho hetukattuvasena, hetuattho cettha antonīto.
anya-e0103n7:152_0: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_1: Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammānaṁ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_2: Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhanīto sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_3: Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_4: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi chahi pariyāyehi niddakkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddakkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:152_5: Ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṁ buddhiatthatāya buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti ekāyanamaggaṁ gatattā buddhoti vuccatīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_6: Eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho, atha kho sayameva anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_7: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṁ bodhoti anatthantaraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:152_8: Tattha yathā rattaguṇayogato ratto paṭo, evaṁ buddhaguṇayogato buddhoti ñāpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:152_9: Tato paraṁ buddhoti netaṁ nāmantiādi atthānugatāyaṁ paññattīti bodhanatthaṁ vuttanti evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:153_1: Guṇavisiṭṭhasabbasattuttamagarugāravādhivacananti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuttavacanamidaṁ bhagavāti.
anya-e0103n7:153_2: Tathā hi lokanātho aparimitanirupamappabhāvasīlādiguṇavisesasamaṅgitāya sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya, accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ uttamagāravaṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0103n7:154_0: Bhagavāti vacanaṁ seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṁ vacanaṁ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato ‘‘seṭṭha’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:154_2: Tasmā yo ‘‘bhagavā’’ti vacanena vacanīyo attho, so seṭṭhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:154_4: Gāravayuttoti garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato, garukaraṇaṁ vā sātisayaṁ arahatīti gāravayutto, gāravārahoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:155_0: Guṇavisesahetukaṁ ‘‘bhagavā’’ti idaṁ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vitthārato vibhajitukāmo nāmaṁyeva tāva atthuddhāravasena dassento ‘‘catubbidhaṁ vā nāma’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:155_1: Tattha āvatthikanti avatthāya viditaṁ taṁ taṁ avatthaṁ upādāya paññattaṁ voharitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:155_2: Tathā liṅgikaṁ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:155_4: Adhiccasamuppannanti yadicchāya pavattaṁ, yadicchāya āgataṁ yadicchakaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:155_5: Paṭhamena ādi-saddena bālo, yuvā, vuḍḍhoti evamādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti, dutiyena muṇḍī, jaṭīti evamādiṁ, tatiyena bahussuto, dhammakathiko, jhāyīti evamādiṁ, catutthena aghamarisanaṁ pāvacananti evamādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n7:155_7: ‘‘Vimokkhantika’’nti iminā idaṁ nāmaṁ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:155_8: Yadi vimokkhantikaṁ, atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha ‘‘saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:155_9: Buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṁ nipphajjamānaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi buddhaguṇehi saddhiṁyeva nipphajjati.
anya-e0103n7:155_12: Atha vā sacchikā paññattīti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti.
anya-e0103n7:155_13: Yaṁguṇanimittā hi sā, te satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti, na paresaṁ vohāramattenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:156_0: 143.Vadantīti mahātherassa garubhāvato bahuvacanenāha, saṅgītikārehi vā katamanuvādaṁ sandhāya.
anya-e0103n7:156_2: Akāsi bhagganti rāgādipāpadhammaṁ bhaggaṁ akāsi, bhaggavāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:158_1: Apica bhaggarāgoti bhagavā, bhaggadosoti bhagavā, bhaggamohoti bhagavā, bhaggamānoti bhagavā, bhaggadiṭṭhīti bhagavā, bhaggataṇhoti bhagavā, bhaggakilesoti bhagavā, bhaji vibhaji pavibhaji dhammaratananti bhagavā, bhavānaṁ antakaroti bhagavā, bhāvitakāyo bhāvitasīlo bhāvitacitto bhāvitapaññoti bhagavā, bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānanti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ catunnaṁ appamaññānaṁ catunnaṁ arūpasamāpattīnanti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṁ vimokkhānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ abhibhāyatanānaṁ navannaṁ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṁ saññābhāvanānaṁ dasannaṁ kasiṇasamāpattīnaṁ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ catunnaṁ sammappadhānānaṁ catunnaṁ iddhipādānaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ pañcannaṁ balānaṁ sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṁ tathāgatabalānaṁ catunnaṁ vesārajjānaṁ catunnaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ channaṁ abhiññānaṁ channaṁ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā, bhagavāti netaṁ nāmaṁ…pe…
anya-e0103n7:159_0: Ettha ca ‘‘gāravādhivacana’’ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṁ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni, yathārahaṁ pana tesaṁ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni.
anya-e0103n7:159_9: Vimuttāyatanasīse hi ṭhatvā dhammaṁ kathentassa, suṇantassa ca tadatthaṁ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṁ attharaso.
anya-e0103n7:159_11: Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘labhati atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammaveda’’nti (a. ni. 6.10).
anya-e0103n7:159_14: Channaṁ buddhadhammānanti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:160_1: Yadipi ‘‘bhāgyavā’’tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho ‘‘bhagī bhajī’’ti niddesagāthāya saṅgahito eva, tathāpi padasiddhi atthavibhāgaatthayojanādisahito saṁvaṇṇanānayo tato aññākāroti vuttaṁ ‘‘ayaṁ pana aparo nayo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:160_2: Ādikanti ādi-saddena vaṇṇavikāro , vaṇṇalopo, dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṁ tividhaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ saṅgaṇhāti.

anya-e0103n7:162_4: Cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatavādā, cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññīvādā, aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā , satta ucchedavādā, pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti etāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni.
anya-e0103n7:162_5: Ajjhattikassa upādāya ‘‘asmī’’ti hoti, ‘‘itthasmī’’ti, ‘‘evasmī’’ti, ‘‘aññathāsmī’’ti, ‘‘bhavissa’’nti, ‘‘itthaṁ bhavissa’’nti, ‘‘evaṁ bhavissa’’nti, ‘‘aññathā bhavissa’’nti, ‘‘asasmī’’ti, ‘‘sātasmī’’ti, ‘‘siya’’nti, ‘‘itthaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘evaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘aññathā siya’’nti, ‘‘apāhaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘apāhaṁ itthaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘apāhaṁ evaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘apāhaṁ aññathā siya’’nti hotīti aṭṭhārasa, bāhirassupādāya ‘‘iminā asmī’’ti hoti, ‘‘iminā itthasmī’’ti, ‘‘iminā evasmī’’ti, ‘‘iminā aññathāsmī’’tiādikā (vibha.

anya-e0103n7:163_3: Sabbāni sattānaṁ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṁ anekāni satasahassāni abhañjīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n7:163_4: Ārammaṇādivibhāgato hi pavattiākāravibhāgato ca anantappabhedā kilesāti.
anya-e0103n7:163_5: Saṅkhepatoti ettha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena kilesamāraṁ, samudayappahānapariññāvasena khandhamāraṁ, sahāyavekallakaraṇavasena sabbathā appavattikaraṇena abhisaṅkhāramāraṁ, balavidhamanavisayātikkamanavasena devaputtamaccumārañca abhañji bhagge akāsi.
anya-e0103n7:163_7: Sampati, āyatiñca sattānaṁ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena kilesāva māroti kilesamāro.
anya-e0103n7:163_9: Tathā hi vuttaṁ ‘‘vadhakaṁ rūpaṁ ‘vadhakaṁ rūpa’nti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānātī’’tiādi (saṁ. ni. 3.85).
anya-e0103n7:163_11: Saṁkilesanimittaṁ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova māroti devaputtamāro.
anya-e0103n7:163_12: Sattānaṁ jīvitassa, jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā maccu eva māroti maccumāro.
anya-e0103n7:164_0: Satapuññalakkhaṇadharassāti anekasatapuññanibbattamahāpurisalakkhaṇavahato rūpakāyasampatti dīpitā hoti, itarāsaṁ phalasampadānaṁ mūlabhāvato, adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ca.
anya-e0103n7:164_5: Puññavantaṁ hi gahaṭṭhā khattiyādayo abhigacchanti, pahīnadosaṁ pabbajitatāpasaparibbājakādayo ‘‘dosavinayāya dhammaṁ desetī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:164_6: Abhigatānañca nesaṁ kāyacittadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo, āmisadānadhammadānehi upakārasabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:164_7: Rūpakāyaṁ tassa pasādacakkhunā, dhammakāyaṁ paññācakkhunā disvā dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanato upagatānañca tesaṁ āmisadānadhammadānehi upakāritā, ‘‘pubbe āmisadānadhammadānehi mayā ayaṁ lokaggabhāvo adhigato, tasmā tumhehipi evameva paṭipajjitabba’’nti evaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyaṁ niyojanena abhigatānaṁ lokiyalokuttarasukhehi saṁyojanasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0103n7:165_0: Sakacitte issariyaṁ attano cittassa vasībhāvāpādanaṁ, yena paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññitādivihārasiddhi, adhiṭṭhāniddhiādiko iddhividhopi cittissariyameva cittabhāvanāya vasībhāvappattiyā ijjhanato.
anya-e0103n7:165_1: Aṇimālaghimādikanti ādi-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṁ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā.
anya-e0103n7:165_9: Ākāsena vā gacchato, aññaṁ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti yatthakāmāvasāyitā.
anya-e0103n7:165_12: Taṁ pana bhagavato iddhividhantogadhaṁ, anaññasādhāraṇañcāti āha ‘‘sabbākāraparipūraṁ atthī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:166_0: Kesañci padesavutti, ayathābhūtaguṇasannissayattā aparisuddho ca yaso hoti, na evaṁ tathāgatassāti dassetuṁ ‘‘lokattayabyāpako’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:166_1: Tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṁ āruppe uppannānaṁ ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinā bhagavato guṇe anussarantānaṁ yaso pākaṭo hotīti āha ‘‘lokattayabyāpako’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:166_5: ‘‘Tiṇṇo tāreyya’’ntiādinā yaṁ yaṁ etena lokanāthena icchitaṁ manovacīpaṇidhānavasena, patthitaṁ kāyapaṇidhānavasena.
anya-e0103n7:167_1: Paṭiccasamuppādādīhīti ādi-saddena na kevalaṁ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṁ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā, atha kho saṅgahādayo, samayavimuttādayo, ṭhapanādayo , tikapaṭṭhānādayo ca saṅgahitāti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:167_2: Dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṭṭho taṁsamaṅgino sattassa hiṁsanaṁ avipphārikatākaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:167_5: Vipariṇāmaṭṭho jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā.
anya-e0103n7:167_7: Nidānaṭṭho ‘‘idaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:167_10: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṁ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā, tannissaraṇanimittatā vā.
anya-e0103n7:167_13: Amataṭṭho niccasabhāvattā maraṇābhāvo, sattānaṁ maraṇābhāvahetutā vā.
anya-e0103n7:167_17: Ādhipateyyaṭṭho catusaccadassane sampayuttānaṁ ādhipaccakaraṇaṁ, ārammaṇādhipatibhāvo vā visesato maggādhipativacanato.
anya-e0103n7:167_18: Satipi hi jhānādīnaṁ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve ‘‘jhānādhipatino dhammā’’ti evamādiṁ avatvā ‘‘maggādhipatino dhammā’’ icceva vuttaṁ, tasmā viññāyati ‘‘atthi maggassa ārammaṇādhipatibhāve viseso’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:167_20: Kasmā panettha aññesu rogagaṇṭhādiākāresu vijjamānesu eteva pariggayhantīti?
anya-e0103n7:169_0: Kilesābhisaṅkhāravasena bhavesu paribbhamanaṁ, so ca taṇhāppadhānoti vuttaṁ ‘‘taṇhāsaṅkhātaṁ gamana’’nti.
anya-e0103n7:169_1: Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṁ puna apaccāvamanavasena chaḍḍitaṁ.

anya-e0103n7:172_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.

anya-e0103n7:173_3: Tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ā-kārassa rassattaṁ katvā ‘‘bhagavā’’ti vutto.
anya-e0103n7:176_1: Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūretabbā dānapāramī, sīlanekkhammapaññāvīriyakhantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāpāramīti dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṁsa pāramiyo, dānādīni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, saccādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, attapariccāgo, nayana, dhana, rajja, puttadārapariccāgoti pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṁ, ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā, buddhatthacariyāti evamādayo, saṅkhepato vā sabbe puññasambhārañāṇasambhārabuddhakārakadhammā, te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṁ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā, saṁkilesabhāgiyā, ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva honti, evaṁ sakkaccaṁ nirantaraṁ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti vattabbe ‘‘bhagavā’’ti vutto niruttinayena ta-kārassa ga-kāraṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:176_2: Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakārakadhamme vuttanayena bhari sambhari, paripūresīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:178_0: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:179_1: Ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṁ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā, te anavasesato lokahitatthaṁ, attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṁ niccakappaṁ niccakappaṁ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:179_2: Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu, kusalādīsu, khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā, vitthārato pana ‘‘cakkhuṁ pariññeyyaṁ…pe…
anya-e0103n7:179_6: 1.21) sacchikātabbabhāgā, ‘‘cakkhussa nirodhagāminī paṭipadā’’tiādinā, ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā, te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṁ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṁ vasena sevi.
anya-e0103n7:179_8: Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā, ‘‘kinti nu kho te veneyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya’’nti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi, sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi.
anya-e0103n7:181_0: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṁ, hitāya bhagavā tato.
anya-e0103n7:182_1: Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṁ bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo.
anya-e0103n7:182_2: Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṁsagate vani bhaji sevi, yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato buddhakārakadhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi.
anya-e0103n7:182_3: Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṁhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi.
anya-e0103n7:182_4: Vitthārato pana padesarajjaissariyacakkavattisampattidevarajjasampattiādivasena, jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiñāṇadassanamaggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādiuttarimanussadhammavasena ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi.
anya-e0103n7:183_0: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthū;
anya-e0103n7:184_0: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:185_1: Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā.
anya-e0103n7:185_2: Tathāgato hi mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimitanirupamappabhāvaguṇavisesasamaṅgi bhāvato sabbasattuttamo sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya accantupakāritāya dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanabyāmappabhādianaññasādhāraṇaguṇavisesapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya yathābhuccaguṇādhigatena ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpināsuvipulena, suvisuddhena ca thutighosena samannāgatattā, ukkaṁsapāramippattāsu appicchatāsantuṭṭhiādīsu supatiṭṭhitabhāvato, dasabalacatuvesārajjādiniratisayaguṇavisesasamaṅgibhāvato ca ‘‘rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno, ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno, dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno’’ti evaṁ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ sadevamanussānaṁ ādarabahumānagāravāyatanatāya paramapemasambhattiṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:185_3: Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti, kenaci asaṁhāriyā tesaṁ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vāti.
anya-e0103n7:185_4: Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṁ na pariccajanti, tassa vā āṇaṁ daḷhabhattibhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:188_0: ‘‘Seyyathāpi , bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati, evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaṁ mayā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ, taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī’’ti (udā. 45; cūḷava. 385) ca.
anya-e0103n7:189_0: Evaṁ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṁ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:191_0: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:192_1: Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṁ siriṁ, issariyaṁ, yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṁ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n7:192_7: 2.17.195 ādayo) evamādīsu nekkhammapāramipūraṇavasena devarajjasadisāya rajjasiriyā pariccattaattabhāvānaṁ parimāṇaṁ natthi.
anya-e0103n7:192_8: Carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṁ cakkavattisiriṁ devalokādhipaccasadisaṁ catudīpissariyaṁ, cakkavattisampattisannissayaṁ sattaratanasamujjalaṁ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho, tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:192_9: Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṁ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā, sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanalokavisesasannissayā sobhā kappaṭṭhiyabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:192_10: Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsasattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti.
anya-e0103n7:195_1: Bhāgā nāma sabhāvadhammakoṭṭhāsā, te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena, tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena, atītādivasena ca anekavidhā, te ca bhagavā ‘‘sabbaṁ papañcaṁ, sabbaṁ yogaṁ, sabbaṁ ganthaṁ, sabbaṁ saṁyojanaṁ samucchinditvā amataṁ dhātuṁ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami.
anya-e0103n7:195_2: Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṁ āpaṁ tejaṁ vāyaṁ, cakkhuṁ sotaṁ ghānaṁ jivhaṁ kāyaṁ manaṁ, rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0103n7:195_10: dhammavicāra’’ntiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri anapekkhapariccāgena chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n7:196_0: ‘‘Yaṁ taṁ, ānanda, cattaṁ vantaṁ muttaṁ pahīnaṁ paṭinissaṭṭhaṁ, taṁ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.183).
anya-e0103n7:197_1: Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho pariccaji pajahi, paresañca tathattāya dhammaṁ desesi.
anya-e0103n7:198_0: ‘‘Dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā (ma. ni. 1.240).
anya-e0103n7:198_1: Kullūpamaṁ vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā’’tiādi (ma. ni. 1.240).
anya-e0103n7:201_0: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:203_0: ‘‘Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n7:204_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:205_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā, tāsu attahitasampatti pahānasampadāñāṇasampadābhedato duvidhā, ānubhāvasampadādīnaṁ tadavinābhāvena tadantogadhattā.
anya-e0103n7:205_2: Tattha payogato lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammūpadeso, āsayato paṭiviruddhesupi niccaṁ hitesitā, ñāṇaparipākakālāgamanādiparahitapaṭipatti ca, āmisapaṭiggahaṇādināpi atthacariyā parahitapaṭipatti hotiyeva.
anya-e0103n7:205_3: Tasmā tesaṁ vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘araha’’ntiādīnaṁ padānaṁ gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:206_0: Tattha ‘‘araha’’nti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:206_3: Saccaṁ vibhāvīyati, atthi pana viseso, ‘‘sammāsambuddho’’ti iminā sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvo vibhāvito, ‘‘lokavidū’’ti pana iminā āsayānusayañāṇādīnampi ānubhāvo vibhāvitoti.
anya-e0103n7:206_5: ‘‘Sugato’’ti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:206_6: ‘‘Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna’’nti imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:206_7: ‘‘Buddho’’ti iminā bhagavato attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:206_8: Evañca katvā ‘‘sammāsambuddho’’ti vatvā ‘‘buddho’’ti vacanaṁ samatthitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:206_10: ‘‘Bhagavā’’ti ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_2: Tattha ‘‘arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidū’’ti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_3: ‘‘Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna’’nti imehi sattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_4: ‘‘Buddho’’ti iminā phalavasena, sattūpakāravasena ca buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_5: ‘‘Sugato bhagavā’’ti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitāti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:208_3: Rāgapariyuṭṭhitanti rāgena pariyuṭṭhitaṁ, pariyuṭṭhānappattehi rāgehi sahitaṁ cittaṁ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṁ, tassa pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvato, pariyuṭṭhitarāganti attho.
anya-e0103n7:208_4: Yaṁ vā rāgassa pariyuṭṭhānaṁ, taṁ taṁsahite citte upacaritanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:208_5: Etasmiṁ pakkhe rāgenāti rāgena hetunāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:208_6: Ujugatamevāti pageva kāyavaṅkādīnaṁ apanītattā, cittassa ca anujubhāvakarānaṁ māyādīnaṁ abhāvato, rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vā onatiunnativirahato ujubhāvameva kataṁ.
anya-e0103n7:208_7: Atha vā ujugatamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa vīthiṁ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamanato majjhimasamathanimittapaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṁ.
anya-e0103n7:209_1: ‘‘So bhagavā itipi araha’’ntiādinā pubbe vuttappakārena buddhaguṇe anuvitakkayatoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n7:209_4: ‘‘Vitakkavicārā pavattantī’’ti etena buddhaguṇasaṅkhātaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ vitakkāhataṁ, vitakkapariyāhataṁ, punappunaṁ anumajjanañca karotīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:209_5: Pīti uppajjatīti bhāvanāvasena upacārajjhānanipphādikā balavatī pīti uppajjati.
anya-e0103n7:209_7: Kāyacittadarathāti kāyacittapassaddhīnaṁ paṭipakkhabhūtā sukhumāvatthā uddhaccasahagatā kilesā.
anya-e0103n7:209_9: Anukkamena ekakkhaṇeti yadā buddhaguṇārammaṇā bhāvanā uparūpari visesaṁ āvahantī pavattati, tadā nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva honti, suvisadāni saddhādīni indriyāni honti, bhāvanāya paguṇatāya vitakkavicārā sātisayaṁ paṭukiccāva honti, balavatī pīti uppajjati, pītipadaṭṭhānā passaddhi savisesā jāyati, passaddhakāyassa samādhipadaṭṭhānaṁ sukhaṁ thirataraṁ hutvā pavattati, sukhena anubrūhitaṁ cittaṁ kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n7:209_10: Evaṁ anukkamena pubbabhāge vitakkādayo uparūpari paṭupaṭutarabhāvena pavattitvā bhāvanāya majjhimasamathapaṭipattiyā indriyānañca ekarasabhāvena paṭutamāni hutvā ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n7:210_0: ‘‘Yasmiṁ , mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṁ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti…pe…
anya-e0103n7:211_0: Kasmā panettha jhānaṁ appanāpattaṁ na hotīti āha ‘‘buddhaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāyā’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:211_1: Gambhīre hi ārammaṇe gambhīre udake patitanāvā viya samathabhāvanā patiṭṭhaṁ na labhati, ‘‘gambhīratāyā’’ti ca iminā sabhāvadhammatāpi saṅgahitā.
anya-e0103n7:211_4: Saccaṁ gayhati pubbabhāge, bhāvanāya pana vaḍḍhamānāya paññattiṁ samatikkamitvā sabhāveyeva cittaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n7:211_5: Nanu ca sabhāvadhammepi katthaci appanā samijjhati dutiyāruppajjhānādīti?
anya-e0103n7:211_6: Saccaṁ samijjhati, tañca kho ekappakāre ārammaṇe, idaṁ pana nānappakāranti dassento ‘‘nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāyā’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:211_7: Evampi yathā nānappakāresu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu manasikāraṁ pavattentassa ekasmiṁyeva koṭṭhāse appanāvasena bhāvanā avatiṭṭhati, evamidha kasmā na hotīti?
anya-e0103n7:211_9: Tattha hi satipi koṭṭhāsabahubhāve ekappakāreneva bhāvanā vattati paṭikkūlākārasseva gahaṇato, idha pana nānappakārena guṇānaṁ nānappakārattā, na ayamekasmiṁyeva guṇe ṭhātuṁ sakkoti bhāvanābalena paccakkhato buddhaguṇesu upaṭṭhahantesu saddhāya balavabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:211_11: Yadi upacārappattaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, kathaṁ buddhānussatīti vuttanti āha ‘‘tadeta’’ntiādi.
anya-e0103n7:212_0: Sagāravo hoti sappatisso, satthu guṇasarīrassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhahanato.
anya-e0103n7:212_7: Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘anussaretha sambuddhaṁ, bhayaṁ tumhāka no siyā’’ti (saṁ. ni.
anya-e0103n7:212_9: Dukkhādhivāsanasamattho buddhānussatiyā sarīradukkhassa padumapalāse udakassa viya vinivaṭṭanato .
anya-e0103n7:212_11: Buddhabhūmiyaṁ cittaṁ namati buddhaguṇānaṁ mahantabhāvassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0103n7:212_12: Buddhānussatibhāvanāya sabbadā buddhaguṇānaṁ citte viparivattanato vuttaṁ ‘‘sammukhā satthāraṁ passato viyā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:212_13: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti imāya bhāvanāya upari taṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ katvā saccāni appaṭivijjhanto.
anya-e0103n7:213_3: Evaṁ mahānubhāvāyāti vuttappakārena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādisamatthena satthari sagāravabhāvādihetubhūtena mahatā sāmatthiyena samannāgatāya.
anya-e0103n7:215_0: 146.Dhammānussatinti ettha padattho, sabhāvattho ca ādito vuttoyevāti taṁ anāmasitvā bhāvanāvidhānameva dassetuṁ ‘‘dhammānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmenāpī’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:215_1: Kasmā panettha buddhānussatiyaṁ viya ‘‘aveccappasādasamannāgatenā’’ti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:215_2: Nanu etā paṭipāṭiyā cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaṁ vasena desanaṁ āruḷhāti?
anya-e0103n7:215_3: Saccametaṁ, evaṁ santepi ‘‘parisuddhasīlādiguṇānaṁ puthujjanānampi ijjhantī’’ti dassanatthaṁ ‘‘aveccappasādasamannāgatenā’’ti idha na vuttaṁ, ariyasāvakānaṁ pana sukhena ijjhantīti.
anya-e0103n7:215_4: Tathāpi pāḷiyaṁ āgatattā ca buddhānussatiniddese vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, ayañca vicāro parato āgamissateva.
anya-e0103n7:216_2: Lokuttaradhammovāti avadhāraṇaṁ nippariyāyena sandiṭṭhikādiatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, pariyāyato panete pariyattidhammepi sambhavanteva.
anya-e0103n7:216_3: Tathā hi pariyattidhammo bahussutena āgatāgamena paramena satinepakkena samannāgatena paññavatā ādikalyāṇatādivisesato sayaṁ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0103n7:216_5: Lokuttaradhammepi samāne kalyāṇamittasannissayeneva sijjhanato, tathā satthusandassanepi.
anya-e0103n7:216_6: ‘‘Sandiṭṭhiyā jayatī’’ti ayaṁ panattho titthiyanimmaddane nippariyāyatova labbhati , kilesajaye pariyāyato paramparāhetubhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:216_7: ‘‘Sandiṭṭhaṁ arahatī’’ti ayampi attho labbhateva, sabbaso saṁkilesadhammānaṁ pahānaṁ, vodānadhammānaṁ paribrūhanañca uddissa pavattattā.
anya-e0103n7:216_8: Ayañca attho ‘‘ye kho tvaṁ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā sarāgāya saṁvattanti no virāgāya, saññogāya saṁvattanti no visaññogāya, saupādānāya saṁvattanti no anupādānāya.
anya-e0103n7:216_9: Ekaṁsena, gotami, dhāreyyāsi ‘neso dhammo, neso vinayo, netaṁ satthusāsana’’’nti (cūḷava. 406; a. ni.
anya-e0103n7:216_10: 8.53), ‘‘dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā’’ti (ma. ni.
anya-e0103n7:216_14: Tato eva vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthikehi attano citte upanayanaṁ, cittassa vā tattha upanayanaṁ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
anya-e0103n7:216_15: Vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā paricayena sammadeva atthavedaṁ, dhammavedañca labhantehi paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti.
anya-e0103n7:216_16: Evaṁ sandiṭṭhikādipadesu pariyattidhammampi pakkhipitvā manasikāro yujjateva.
anya-e0103n7:217_3: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi, yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu ‘‘gāthā’’ti samaññā, taṁ tato bhinnaṁ viya katvā saṁsāmivohāraṁ āropetvā dassento ‘‘paṭhamena pādena ādikalyāṇā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:217_4: ‘‘Ekānusandhika’’nti idaṁ nātibahuvibhāgaṁ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, itarassa pana teneva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhantīti.
anya-e0103n7:217_7: 1.249), ‘‘iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni.
anya-e0103n7:218_0: Ayaṁ kathā visesato suttapiṭakasaṁvaṇṇanāti katvā suttapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇādikaṁ dassetvā idāni suttapiṭakavinayapiṭakānaṁ vasena taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sanidānasauppattikattā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:218_1: Tattha sanidānasauppattikattāti yathāvuttanidānena sanidānatāya, saaṭṭhuppattikatāya ca.
anya-e0103n7:218_2: Veneyyānaṁ anurūpatoti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā, dhammadesanāya ca taṁtaṁsikkhāpadabhāvena paññāpiyamānassa veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṁ pavattiyamānassa anurūpato.
anya-e0103n7:219_0: Evaṁ suttavinayavasena pariyattidhammassa ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇataṁ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni ekajjhaṁ gahetvā taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sakalopī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:221_0: Sacittapariyodapanaṁ, etaṁ buddhāna sāsana’’nti. (dha. pa. 183; dī. ni. 2.90) –
anya-e0103n7:222_4: Sāsane sammāpaṭipatti nāma paññāya hoti, tassā ca sīlaṁ, samādhi ca mūlanti āha ‘‘sīlasamādhīhi ādikalyāṇo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:222_5: Paññā pana anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto ‘‘vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:222_6: Tassa nipphatti phalaṁ, kiccaṁ nibbānasacchikiriyā, tato paraṁ kattabbaṁ natthīti dassento āha ‘‘phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:222_7: Phalaggahaṇena vā saupādisesanibbānamāha, itarena itaraṁ, tadubhayañca sāsanasampattiyā osānanti āha ‘‘phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:223_0: Buddhassa subodhitā sammāsambuddhatā, tāya ādikalyāṇo tappabhavattā.
anya-e0103n7:223_1: Sabbaso saṁkilesappahānaṁ vodānaṁ, pāripūrī ca dhammasudhammatā, tāya majjhekalyāṇo taṁsarīrattā.
anya-e0103n7:223_2: Satthārā yathānusiṭṭhaṁ tathā paṭipatti saṅghasuppaṭipatti, tāya pariyosānakalyāṇo, tāya sāsanassa loke suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:223_4: Tathattāyāti yathattāya bhagavatā dhammo desito, tathattāya tathabhāvāya.
anya-e0103n7:223_5: So pana abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti tividho , ito aññathā nibbānādhigamassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:223_6: Tattha sabbaguṇehi aggabhāvato, itarabodhidvayamūlatāya ca paṭhamāya bodhiyā ādikalyāṇatā, guṇehi vemajjhabhāvato dutiyāya majjhekalyāṇatā, tadubhayāvaratāya, tadosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa tatiyāya pariyosānakalyāṇatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n7:224_1: Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanatoti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṁ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṁ vikkhambhanasambhavato.
anya-e0103n7:225_0: ‘‘Yathā yathāvuso, bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammaṁ deseti, aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī , tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṁ labhati dhammaveda’’nti (a. ni. 5.26).
anya-e0103n7:226_0: ‘‘Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti, pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṁ samaye pahīnāni hontī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.219) –
anya-e0103n7:227_1: Samathavipassanāsukhāvahanatoti samathasukhassa ca vipassanāsukhassa ca sampādanato.
anya-e0103n7:228_0: ‘‘So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukha’’ntiādi (dī. ni. 1.279; ma. ni. 2.138).
anya-e0103n7:232_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṁ vipassato’’ti ca. (dha. pa. 374, 373);
anya-e0103n7:233_0: Tathāpaṭipannoti yathā samathavipassanāsukhaṁ āvahati, yathā vā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṁ, tathā paṭipanno sāsanadhammo.
anya-e0103n7:233_1: Tādibhāvāvahanatoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato.
anya-e0103n7:233_2: Esa bhagavā vuttanayena tividhakalyāṇaṁ dhammaṁ desento yaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ, maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, taṁ yathānurūpaṁ atthasampattiyā sātthaṁ, byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjananti yojanā.
anya-e0103n7:234_0: Tattha avisesena tisso sikkhā, sakalo ca tantidhammo sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:234_1: Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘katamesānaṁ kho, bhante, buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ brahmacariyaṁ naciraṭṭhitikaṁ ahosī’’tiādi (pārā. 18).
anya-e0103n7:234_3: Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīya’’nti (mahāva. 23; saṁ. ni. 5.186).
anya-e0103n7:234_10: Ye panettha ‘‘vacanasabhāvaṁ sātthaṁ, atthasabhāvaṁ sabyañjana’’nti vibhajitvā vadanti, taṁ na sundaraṁ, tathā vibhattassa pariyattidhammassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:234_11: Saddatthā hi abhinnarūpā viya hutvā viniyogaṁ gacchanti.
anya-e0103n7:234_13: Satipi vā bhede ‘‘sabyañjana’’nti ettha yadi tulyayogo adhippeto ‘‘saputto āgato’’tiādīsu viya, evaṁ sati ‘‘atthapaṭisaraṇā, bhikkhave, hotha, mā byañjanapaṭisaraṇā’’ti atthappadhānavādo bādhito siyā, atha vijjamānatāmattaṁ ‘‘salomako sapakkhako’’tiādīsu viya byañjanasampatti aggahitā siyā.

anya-e0103n7:242_9: Etesaṁ akkharādīnaṁ byañjanapadānaṁ sampattiyā sampannatāya sabyañjanaṁ.

anya-e0103n7:244_4: Te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā gambhīrā.
anya-e0103n7:244_7: Desanā paññatti, yathādhammaṁ dhammābhilāpo, anulomapaṭilomasaṅkhepavitthārādivasena vā kathanaṁ.

anya-e0103n7:244_9: Tepi cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā gambhīrā.
anya-e0103n7:244_10: Tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā vuttaṁ ‘‘atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sāttha’’nti atthaguṇadīpanato.
anya-e0103n7:244_11: Tāsaṁ dhammadesanānaṁ byañjanasannissitattā vuttaṁ ‘‘dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana’’nti tāsaṁ byañjanasampattidīpanato.

anya-e0103n7:245_6: Yasmā parikkhakajanānaṁ kiṁkusalagavesīnaṁ pasādāvahaṁ, tasmā sātthaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:245_7: Atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṁ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
anya-e0103n7:245_8: Sātthakatā panassa paṇḍitavedanīyatāya, sā paramagambhīrasaṇhasukhumabhāvato veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:245_10: Lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjananti yasmā lokiyajanassa pasādāvahaṁ, tasmā sabyañjanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:245_11: Lokiyajano hi byañjanasampattiyā tussati, idhāpi phalena hetuno anumānaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:245_12: Sabyañjanatā panassa saddheyyatāya, sā ādikalyāṇādibhāvato veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:246_0: Atha vā paṇḍitavedanīyato sāttha’’nti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṁ āha, tato parikkhakajanappasādakaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:246_1: Saddheyyato sabyañjananti saddhāpadaṭṭhānatāya byañjanasampannataṁ, tato lokiyajanappasādakanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:246_2: Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthanti adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṁ aññathā tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:246_3: Uttānapadato sabyañjananti subodhasaddatāya byañjanasampannaṁ, paramagambhīrassapi atthassa veneyyānaṁ suviññeyyabhāvāpādanato.

anya-e0103n7:246_5: Tathā hettha vikappassa, samuccayassa vā aggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:247_1: Adhigamabyattitoti saccapaṭivedhena adhigamaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sātthaṁ kapilavatādi viya tucchaṁ niratthakaṁ ahutvā atthasampannanti katvā.

anya-e0103n7:248_0: Evaṁ ādikalyāṇatādiapadesena satthu purimavesārajjadvayavasena dhammassa svākkhātataṁ vibhāvetvā idāni pacchimavesārajjadvayavasenāpi taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘atthavipallāsābhāvato vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti svākkhāto’’ti vatvā tamatthaṁ byatirekamukhena vibhāvento ‘‘yathā hī’’tiādimāha.

anya-e0103n7:249_0: Nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyāti adhigantabbassa sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭassa nibbānassa anurūpāya sabbasaṅkhāranissaraṇūpāyabhūtāya sapubbabhāgāya sammāpaṭipattiyā akkhātattāti yojanā.

anya-e0103n7:250_0: 148.‘‘Rāgādīnaṁ abhāvaṁ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṁ daṭṭhabbo’’ti iminā ‘‘ariyamaggena mama rāgādayo pahīnā’’ti sayaṁ attanā anaññaneyyena daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhi eva sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0103n7:251_0: Tenatena ariyasāvakena parasaddhāya parassa saddahanena paraneyyena gantabbataṁ hitvā ñāpetabbataṁ pahāya paccavekkhaṇañāṇena karaṇabhūtena.
anya-e0103n7:251_2: Ariyamaggo attanā sampayuttāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati, ariyaphalaṁ tāya eva attano kāraṇabhūtāya, nibbānaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇena attano visayībhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n7:252_2: Phalampi heṭṭhimaṁ sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṁ paccayabhāvena upari maggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato pariyāyato ‘‘dissamāno vaṭṭabhayaṁ nivattetī’’ti vattabbataṁ labhati.
anya-e0103n7:253_1: Yathā hi lokiyakusalassa ‘‘upapajje, aparapariyāye’’tiādinā phaladānaṁ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi, na evametassāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:253_4: Phaladānaṁ pati kālo pakaṭṭho assāti kāliko, kālantaraphaladāyī.
anya-e0103n7:254_3: Amanuññampi kadāci payojanavasena yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṁ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṁ dassento āha ‘‘manuññabhāvappakāsanenā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:255_1: Upanetabboti upaneyyo, upaneyyova opaneyyikoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā āha ‘‘upanetabboti opaneyyiko’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:255_2: Citte upanayanaṁ uppādananti āha ‘‘idaṁ saṅkhate lokuttaradhamme yujjatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:255_3: Citte upanayananti pana ārammaṇabhūtassa dhammassa ārammaṇabhāvūpanayane adhippete asaṅkhatepi yujjeyya ‘‘ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātaṁ upanayanaṁ arahatīti opaneyyiko’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:256_1: Te pana ekaṁsato ugghaṭitaññūādayo hontīti āha ‘‘ugghaṭitaññūādīhī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:256_2: ‘‘Paccatta’’nti etassa ‘‘pati attanī’’ti bhummavasena attho gahetabboti āha ‘‘attani attanī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:256_3: Veditabboti vuttaṁ, kathaṁ veditabboti āha ‘‘bhāvito me’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:256_4: Tattha ‘‘me’’ti iminā ‘‘paccatta’’nti padena vuttamatthaṁ anvayato dassetvā puna byatirekena dassetuṁ ‘‘na hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ, taṁ suviññeyyameva.
anya-e0103n7:256_5: ‘‘Viññūhī’’ti idaṁ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti dassento ‘‘bālānaṁ pana avisayo cesā’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:257_0: Evaṁ ādikalyāṇatādinā aññamaññassa anurūpadesanāya dhammassa svākkhātataṁ dassetvā idāni purimassa purimassa pacchimaṁ pacchimaṁ padaṁ kāraṇavacananti dassento ‘‘apicā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:257_1: Tattha sandiṭṭhikattāti yasmā ayaṁ dhammo vuttanayena sāmaṁ daṭṭhabbo, sandiṭṭhiyā kilese viddhaṁseti, sandassanañca arahati, tasmā svākkhāto durakkhāte titthiyadhamme tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:257_2: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi yathārahaṁ attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:258_0: 153.Tassevantiādīsu yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ buddhānussatiyaṁ vuttanayena veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:260_0: 154.Ariyasaṅghaguṇāti ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato, sadevakena ca lokena ‘‘saraṇa’’nti araṇīyato ariyo ca so saṅgho ca, ariyānaṁ vā saṅgho ariyasaṅgho, tassa guṇā.
anya-e0103n7:261_2: Sā ariyamaggapaṭipadā paṭipakkhadhamme anivattidhamme katvā pajahanato payojanābhāvā sayampi anivattidhammā, adhigantabbassa ca nibbānassa ekaṁsato anulomīti.
anya-e0103n7:261_3: Tato eva apaccanīkā, anudhammabhūtā ca, tassā ca paṭipannattā ariyasaṅgho ‘‘suppaṭipanno’’ti vuttoti dassetuṁ ‘‘suṭṭhu paṭipanno’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:261_5: Punappunaṁ nivattane hi sati ujuppaṭipatti na hoti.
anya-e0103n7:261_7: Paṭipajjitabbassa hi nibbānassa anulomanena, apaccanīkatāya cassā ñāyato.
anya-e0103n7:261_9: Etena paṭhamapadassa papañcaniddeso, itarāni tīṇi padānīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:262_0: Yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjanena kiccasiddhito ariyabhāvāvahaṁ savanaṁ sakkaccasavanaṁ nāmāti vuttaṁ ‘‘sakkaccaṁ suṇantīti sāvakā’’ti, tena ariyā eva nippariyāyato satthu sāvakā nāmāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:262_1: Sīladiṭṭhisāmaññatāyāti ariyena sīlena, ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā samānabhāvena.
anya-e0103n7:262_2: Ariyānañhi sīladiṭṭhiyo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṁ viya ninnānākaraṇaṁ maggenāgatattā.
anya-e0103n7:262_3: Tena te yattha katthaci ṭhitāpi saṁhatāva.
anya-e0103n7:262_11: Apaṇṇakabhāvena ñāyati kamati nibbānaṁ, taṁ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo.
anya-e0103n7:262_13: Anurūpattā sāmīci opāyikātipi saṅkhaṁ samaññaṁ gatā sammāpaṭipatti, tāya samaṅgitāya suppaṭipannā ‘‘sammā paṭipajjantī’’ti katvā.
anya-e0103n7:262_14: Vattamānattho hi ayaṁ paṭipanna-saddo yathā ‘‘sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno’’ti (pu. pa. 206).
anya-e0103n7:262_16: Ubhayena ca sāmaññaniddesena, ‘‘suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā’’ti ekasesanayena vā gahitānaṁ samūho ‘‘suppaṭipanno’’ti vuttoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:263_0: Evaṁ ādipadatthaniddesabhāvena itarapadānaṁ atthaṁ vatvā idāni catunnampi padānaṁ avomissakaṁ atthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:263_1: Tattha yathānusiṭṭhanti satthārā yathā anusiṭṭhaṁ, tathā anusāsanīanurūpanti attho.
anya-e0103n7:263_3: Ettha ca svākkhāte dhammavinaye apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannattāti evaṁ sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:263_4: Purimapadena sambandhe dutiyapadaṁ na vattabbaṁ siyā, nanu ca dutiyapadena sambandhepi paṭhamaṁ padaṁ na vattabbaṁ siyāti?
anya-e0103n7:263_6: Sā pana sāvakānaṁ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipadāti dassanatthaṁ ‘‘yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipannattā’’ti vattabbaṁ .
